version_description:
[Features]
・Support authentication by google account.

[Bug Fix]
・Bottom row of code keyboard was hidden on some device settings.

[Update info]
- Release Python course.

[Features]
・Share to Twitter and Facebook when you complete a lesson.
・Improvements in the Python course judge system.

[Features]
・Release Java course.
・Bug fix: People on the Academic Plan were still blocked from their lessons registered under Progate Plus. All of you on an Academic Plan will now be able to access your registered lessons.

Thank you for using Progate!

This time we only made some minor adjustments. You probably won't notice much, but these changes will help make our system more efficient.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know at info@progate.com!

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・Added animations for navigating between the main screens (Languages, Dashboard, & Profile)
・Updated our share button for completing lessons. It also animates!

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know at info@progate.com!

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・Added our first Go lesson!

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know at info@progate.com!

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・Fixed a bug that prevented users with a web subscription from accessing Plus lessons.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know at info@prog-8.com!

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・SQL Study I has been released!
・Bug Fix: Even after paying, the subscription wasn't reflected on the app for some users. If you subscribed and couldn't access Progate Plus lessons, you should be able to now!
・Bug Fix: On some pages, the keyboard was partially hidden and some keys couldn't be accessed.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know at info@prog-8.com!

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・Fixed a bug that triggered unnecessary error messages on startup for some users.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know at info@prog-8.com!

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・Added a password reset link on the login screen.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know at info@progate.com!

Happy coding!

・Made design adjustments to support iPhone XS Max.
・Bug fix: We fixed the Google login button so those with Google accounts can now log in without any issues.

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・You can now search through lesson slides with our newly added slide library!
・We updated our logo to match the current one on our website.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know at info@progate.com!

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・We adjusted the swipe gesture in the Slide Library's slide view. When you tap on a slide in the Slide Library, it should be easier to swipe up to view the other slides for that lesson page.
・We made some improvements that will reduce the app startup time.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know at info@progate.com!

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・This time we only made some minor adjustments. You probably won't notice much, but these changes will help make our system more efficient.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know at info@progate.com!

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・We have integrated the web (https://progate.com) dashboard! What was previously the Settings page now includes a dashboard with the following features:
- Your total cleared exercises count and completed lessons count
- A calendar of the past month that tracks how many exercises you've cleared
- Progress percentages for each language that you're working on

・The Lesson Progress page has also been updated to reflect the web dashboard. Both the 'In Progress' and 'Completed Lessons' tabs now include your progress for web lessons.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know! You can contact us by going to Help & Support > Contact Us in the app.

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・Bug fix: The Dashboard Recent History calendar was displayed in Japanese for some users.
・Bug fix: The Dashboard Achievement Levels did not completely match the ones shown on the web.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know! You can contact us by going to Help & Support > Contact Us in the app.

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・PHP Study I has been released!
・Swift Study I has been released!

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know! You can contact us by going to Help & Support > Contact Us in the app.

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・We updated our terms and privacy policy. You'll be able to confirm these changes when you open the app, and you can always look back at them by going to the Help & Support page.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know! You can contact us by going to Help & Support > Contact Us in the app.

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・SQL Study Ⅱ has been released!

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know! You can contact us by going to Help & Support > Contact Us in the app.

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・Bug fix: The icons for web lessons in progress weren't being displayed.
・Bug fix: We fixed the search feature for the Slide Library, which wasn't as accurate before.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know! You can contact us by going to Help & Support > Contact Us in the app.

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・You will no longer lose XP if you look at the answer.
・We redesigned the loading screen.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know! You can contact us by going to Help & Support > Contact Us in the app.

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・This time we only made some minor adjustments. You probably won’t notice much, but these changes will help make our system more efficient.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know! You can contact us by going to Help & Support > Contact Us in the app.

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・Bug fix: The dashboard calendar had minor display issues.
・Bug fix: Some PHP exercises couldn't be cleared with certain answers.
・Bug fix: Email addresses weren't always displayed correctly in the account settings.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know! You can contact us by going to Help & Support > Contact Us in the app.

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・Bug fix: When quitting an exercise, the app would get stuck on the loading screen.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know! You can contact us by going to Help & Support > Contact Us in the app.

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・This update only affects the Japanese version (we added an announcement explaining the effect of the new Japanese tax law). You can install this update if you would like, but nothing will change.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know! You can contact us by going to Help & Support > Contact Us in the app.

Happy coding!

Thank you for using Progate!

[Updates]
・Bug fix: When completing a lesson, the app would unexpectedly crash.

If you experience any errors or have questions, please let us know! You can contact us by going to Help & Support > Contact Us in the app.
